TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectItemCollection extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ItemCollection

Docs.summary: Class for representing a collection of items for the object layer. Most of the implemetation for actual maintainance of the collection is done by ItemCollection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetClrType (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumType objectSpaceType);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Type GetClrType(class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumType objectSpaceType) cil managed

Docs.param: The OSpace type to look up.
Docs.summary: The method returns the underlying CLR type for the specified OSpace type argument. If the DataSpace of the parameter is not OSpace, an ArgumentException is thrown.
Docs.returns: The CLR type of the OSpace argument.

Docs.typeparam: The type returned by the method.
Docs.summary: Returns all the items of the specified type from this item collection.
Docs.returns: A collection of type that contains all items of the specified type.

Docs.param: The OSpace enum type to look up
The CLR enum type of the OSpace argument
Docs.summary: Returns the underlying CLR type for the specified OSpace enum type argument. If the DataSpace of the parameter is not OSpace, the method returns false and sets the out parameter to null.
Docs.returns: true on success, false on failure
